price: ¡Basta! [Piensen en cuál será su destino] cuando la Tierra sea golpeada una y otra vez,
arabic: كَلَّآۖ إِذَا دُكَّتِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ دَكّٗا دَكّٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: kallā idhā dukkati al-arḍu dakkan dakkan
